Entries.Mon8: Some days I still can't believe I'm no longer living in a trailer.$h
Entries.3_2: You'd think we wouldn't have so many dishes to do, considering the fact that Mom mostly lives off of TV dinners...
Entries.7_2: Gotta swing by the post office to pick up our mail today.#$b#What am I waiting for? Just a copy of the latest Homes and Gardens magazine.#$e#I'd love, love to decorate more, but I haven't the time. It's hard enough just keeping our home clean.
Entries.11_2: @, are you planning on seeing the new movie with %name Taylor?
Entries.13_2: If you weren't a farmer, @, what would you want to be?#$b#Me? I'm not sure. I think...I think I mostly want to be a mother.#$e#When I was a kid I wanted to be an archaeologist though.
Entries.14_2: Mom says I spend too much time taking care of her.#$b#I'm not sure how not to, though.$s

Entries.3_2: When we lived in the trailer, Mrs. Mullner would let me do laundry in her washer.#$b#She's always been so nice to my mother and I.$h
Entries.4_2: I made some extra poppyseed muffins, @, do you want one?$h[651]
Entries.5_2: I have so much mopping I need to do.$s
